title: Neon Silhouette in the Dark
caption: A shadowy figure brought to life by vivid neon outlines.
style: Silhouetted figure outlined with glowing neon energy, set against a dark background with purple haze.
character_placement: Centered, with the neon outline radiating outward.
character_size: Dominant, occupying the majority of the frame to emphasize presence.
character_facing: Facing forward, slightly turned to create a dynamic perspective.
dimensionality: 2D silhouette with 3D effects from neon highlights and background haze.
art_profile: High contrast between dark shadows and bright neon, focusing on dynamic motion and mystery.
